short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mrs. M (Automation) helps in efficient notification management, seamless connection requests, and automated tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mrs. M LinkedIn Automation help you in keep your time off from unnecessary visit on linkedin and provide you important notification like message, new connection and new notifications in one click and automation for linkedin time consuming works. 

Like reading comments, exporting your network and adding new members to network. It is complete extension to automate your linkedin work.

Additionally you can save and mail relevant company and candidates. And grow your followers of page and profile with automation.
